95  struct FluidProperties: public SteamPropertiesOutput {

97  const double quality, const double specificVolume, const double density, const double specificEnthalpy,
98  const double specificEntropy, const double internalEnergy = 0):

412  static inline double boundaryByTemperatureRegion3to2(const double t) {
413  return 0.34805185628969E+03 - 0.11671859879975E+01 * t + 0.10192970039326E-02 * std::pow(t, 2.0);
414  }
415 
423  static inline double boundaryByPressureRegion3to2(const double p) {
424  return 0.57254459862746E+03 + std::pow((p - 0.13918839778870E+02) / 0.10192970039326E-02, 0.5);
425  }
